basics.name: Álvaro Moreno Morejón
basics.label: IT Technician and Software Developer
basics.summary: Technician specialized in IT systems and software development with hands-on experience in logistics, inventory management, and technical support.

work.name: Ábaco (San Bernardo Train Station)
work.summary: Conducted precise foot traffic data collection for infrastructure planning.
highlights: Ensured data accuracy through meticulous observation and recording.
Collaborated with team members to manage workload efficiently during peak hours.
Provided insights based on data trends to support infrastructure planning.

work.name: El Corte Inglés (ECI Nervión & Duque)
work.summary: Provided technical support and maintenance for computer systems and networks.
highlights: Resolved hardware and software issues promptly to minimize downtime.
Conducted system updates and implemented new solutions to improve efficiency.
Ensured network stability and optimized configurations for performance.

work.name: Nespresso Boutique, El Corte Inglés Nervión
work.summary: Managed inventory and stock control in the boutique.
highlights: Monitored and tracked incoming and outgoing stock to ensure accurate inventory records.
Organized and maintained storage areas to optimize space and facilitate efficient stock retrieval.
Collaborated with the sales team to ensure product availability and timely restocking during peak periods.

work.name: El Corte Inglés (ECI San Juan)
work.summary: Assisted in the installation and configuration of computer systems.
highlights: Provided support for network troubleshooting and hardware maintenance.
Conducted updates and diagnostics to ensure system efficiency.
Documented technical issues and solutions to improve future response times.

work.name: Ábaco (Santa Justa Train Station)
work.summary: Conducted precise foot traffic data collection for infrastructure planning.
highlights: Ensured data accuracy through meticulous observation and recording.
Provided support to supervisors by preparing detailed reports of daily activity.
Adapted to different environments to maintain consistency in data collection.

references.name: Jose Manuel Sánchez Del Pino
references.position: Teacher at IES Vedruna and Software Developer at Babel.
